details.msg: [LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Uses keyword-based classification instead of LLM-based categorization for memory classification, making it brittle and less accurate', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Complex interrupt implementation with multiple nodes and state management instead of using simple langgraph interrupt() function', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Added unnecessary fields to State class (pending_memories, user_confirmation) that complicate the architecture', severity='minor')]
